Quickstrike cliamed to his feet on top of the creature.
"Alright just stand here for a minute." he said to it.  He turned 
back to the troops on the ground.
"Okay, now are you guys going to tell me how to join up or do ya 
want some more?!"  He said in a commaning voice.
